Title: PanView - A Metro Panning Custom Control
Description: A custom control for displaying panning content Windows Metro style (WinRT) applications written in C# / XAML.
HomeWiki:
PanFlyout - Another Panning Custom Control for WinRT / Metro Style applications.

Binaries available at: http://nuget.org/packages/PanView

See a discussion here: http://w8isms.blogspot.com/2012/07/panview-metro-panning-custom-control.html
.
